Verses: 1 aabaththunaalile Karththar Umadhu Jebaththaik Ketpaaraaga; Yaakkobin Dhevanudaiya Naamam Umakku Uyarndha Adaikkalamaavadhaaga.
2 avar Parisuththa Sthalaththilirundhu Umakku Oththaasaiyanuppi, Seeyonilirundhu Ummai Aadharippaaraaga.
3 neer Seluththum Kaanikkaigalaiyellaam Avar Ninaiththu, Umadhu Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaip Piriyamaai Etrukkolvaaraaga. (selaa.)
4  Avar Umadhu Manaviruppaththinpadi Umakkuth Thandharuli, Umadhu Aalosanaigalaiyellaam Niraivetruvaaraaga.
5 naangal Umadhu Ratchippinaal Magizhndhu, Engal Dhevanudaiya Naamaththile Kodiyetruvom; Umadhu Vendudhalgalaiyellaam Karththar Niraivetruvaaraaga.

6 karththar Thaam Abishegampanninavarai Iratchikkiraar Enpadhai Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkiren; Thamadhu Valadhukaram Seyyum Iratchippin Vallamaigalaik Kaanpiththu, Thamadhu Parisuththa Vaanaththilirundhu Avarudaiya Jebaththaik Ketpaar.
7 silar Radhangalaikkuriththum, Silar Kudhiraigalaik Kuriththum Menmaipaaraattugiraargal; Naangalo Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththaikkuriththe Menmaipaaraattuvom.
8 avargal Murindhu Vizhundhaargal; Naangalo Ezhundhu Nimirndhu Nirkirom.
9 karththaave, Ratchiyum; Naangal Kooppidugira Naalile Raajaa Engalukku Sevikoduppaaraaga.
